name: MPMusicPlayerPlayParameters
desc: The MusicKit parameters that describe items to be played.

items.name: init?(dictionary: [String : Any])
items.desc: Returns a new play parameters object using information from MusicKit.

items.name: var dictionary: [String : Any]
items.desc: The information returned from a MusicKit query and stored in a play parameters object.

items.name: init(from: Decoder)
items.desc: Creates a new parameters object by decoding from the given decoder.

items.name: func encode(to: Encoder)
items.desc: Encodes the parameters object into the given encoder.
